doc:
Linda Kerridge https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Linda_Kerridge 0 Linda Kerridge (born 18 November 1954) is an Australian former actress and model. She rose to notoriety for her impersonations of actress Marilyn Monroe, and her resemblance to the actress led to her casting in the horror film Fade to Black (1980), in which she played a Monroe-lookalike character. Linda_Kerridge ( born_18_November_1954 ) is an_Australian_former_actress_and_model . She rose to notoriety for her_impersonations of actress_Marilyn_Monroe , and her_resemblance to the_actress led to her_casting in the_horror_film Fade to Black_(_1980_) , in which she played a_Monroe-lookalike_character .
